snippet.title: The Other Side - Early Teaser
snippet.description:
The Other Side is an upcoming mobile puzzle crafted by Florian Veltman and Baptiste Portefaix. Inspired by children’s book illustrations, risograph prints and screen printing techniques, its beautiful visuals convey the warmth and personality of hand crafted pictures. You follow the story of a group of ghosts looking to discover who they were and why they are still here, through a family friendly tale of loss, how to deal with it, and acceptance. Navigate an intricate world filled with mind-bending yet fun puzzles, find clues about the identities of our spirit friends, and help them reach the other side.

http://florian.games/theotherside/

Florian on twitter https://twitter.com/FlorianVltmn
Baptiste on twitter https://twitter.com/baptisteworks
